com.jensen.model.EJB

Class MessageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jensen.model.EJB.MessageManager

  • public class MessageManager
extends Object
    MessageManger is Singelton class and that has a synchronizedList of messages. MessageManager takes care of sending messages. It iterates through the list of messages return null if its empty otherwise returns all the messages the list contains.

    Created on Dec 15, 2017

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Saikat Talukder And Roberto

      Message getFirstAfter(Date after)
      Gets the first Message object of the messages list and all the other after it.

        public Message getFirstAfter(Date after)
